tool_description: An API showing all german breweries and beers with a couple of informations (beer-rating, locations, etc.)
name: Beer Live
title: Beer Live

api_list.name: TOP10 Beers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-live.p.rapidapi.com/top10beers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get breweries in specific location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-live.p.rapidapi.com/brews/hessen"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

import requests

url = "https://beer-live.p.rapidapi.com/brews/{brewid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all beers from Germany
api_list.description:
This Endpoint shows all the beers from Germany.
Its include the name of the beer, its location and some rating
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beer-live.p.rapidapi.com/beers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beer-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
